name: Primal Carnage: Onslaught
description: Fight hordes of hungry prehistoric reptiles with an arsenal of powerful weapons in fast-paced virtual reality dinosaur combat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel®  i7-4770 or above Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti or above DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
